testcase.classname: Validating all Functions of Adactin Application
testcase.name: Validating login function of AdactIn with Valid Username and Valid Password
testcase.system-out: Given I am on a Adactin page on Chrome Browser..............................passed When I need to enter Username and Password..................................passed And I need to click Login button............................................passed Then I need to verify the Home page Screen appear or not....................passed When I need to select Location , Hotel , Room Type , No of rooms............passed And Enter checkin date and Checkout date....................................passed Then I need to select Adults per room and Childrens per room................passed And I need to click Search button...........................................passed Then I need to verify whether browser navigated to payment page.............passed When I need to select the booking and click continue........................passed Then I need to check browser navigated to next page.........................passed When I need to enter Firstname , lastname , Address and Credit Card No......passed And Select card type , Expiry date and Expiry year..........................passed Then I need to enter Cvv no and click book now..............................passed Then I need to check browser navigated to next page.........................passed When I need to click itenarary and navigte to next page.....................passed When Need to print the ID...................................................passed
